data.author: Willem Olding

changelog.release_notes: In last update everyone stopped receiving timeline pins because I deployed the version with a link to the dev server (*facepalm*). This version fixes that blunder.

New build for SDK 3.4
 - fixes major bug where long dates would write over important variables

Version 1.1 adds:
- Support for selecting units
- Better error notifications
- Ability to unsubscribe from sites
- Pins are automatically removed when changing sites
First public release version! If you find any bugs please contact tideline.watchapp@gmail.com

data.description:
Get accurate tide predictions delivered to your Pebble watch. Tideline adds pins to your timeline for high and low tide events. Tide information can also be viewed directly in the app.

Currently supports thousands of tide stations in the USA, Caribbean, Pacific, New Zealand, Australia and Antarctica!

More features are planned for future releases including:
- Additional tide locations
- More animations and eye candy

Please contact tideline.watchapp@gmail.com if you have any bug reports, feature requests or just want to say that you like my app ;)

latest_release.release_notes: In last update everyone stopped receiving timeline pins because I deployed the version with a link to the dev server (*facepalm*). This version fixes that blunder.

data.title: Tideline
